titles.title: A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to repay States for amounts expended by States to operate units of the National Park System during a Government shutdown.
A bill to require the Secretary of the Interior to repay States for amounts expended by States to operate units of the National Park System during a Government shutdown.

action.text: Read twice and referred to the Committee on Energy and Natural Resources.

bill.summary: This bill requires the Department of the Interior to repay states for amounts expended to operate units of the National Park System during a government shutdown.
